title: Learning Design Theory Development Workshop: A Design-Based Research Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogical theories and basic learning design experience
context.additional_context: Program aimed at strengthening learning design competencies that integrate theory and practice in language education

learning_goals: Learners can explain the interconnection between theory and practice in the field of instructional design.
Learners can develop learning theories by utilizing analytical (problem-based) and creative (solution-based) approaches.
Learners can apply instructional design theories to real-world contexts through reflective practice (reflection-in-action).
Learners can draft an instructional design framework using dialogic interpretation techniques.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
